Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Bakenamun with a black lappet wig, a collar represented by a black line, the hands now invisible, the legs inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs, the back painted white, the whole figure thickly varnished.
Condition: fair - back of head damaged and varnish worn
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
